meanings.definition: The outer edge or boundary of a town or city.
meanings.sent1: The houses on the outskirt of the town have big gardens.
meanings.sent2: We took a walk around the outskirt of the city to explore.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel on the outskirt of the park was playing hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts wandered to the outskirt of reality, where dreams roam free.
meanings.sent5: The outskirt of the forest was alive with the sounds of nature.

meanings.definition: A remote or less developed area on the outskirts of a city.
meanings.sent1: The small village on the outskirt of the city was peaceful.
meanings.sent2: People often visit the outskirt of the city for a quiet retreat.
meanings.sent3: The outskirt of the city felt like a hidden gem waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent4: In the outskirt of the city, time seemed to move slower.
meanings.sent5: The outskirt of the city was a haven for those seeking solitude.
